summary: Capable Accountant with 35 years of experience, skilled at managing multiple projects and meeting deadlines under pressure. Extensive knowledge of accounting software and processes. Experienced in industries including Public Accounting, Petrochemical/Research and Technology, Oil and Gas Services, Equestrian Farms, Manufacturing and Health Care. Highlights include Month-End Financial Analysis, Variance Explanations, Budgeting, Fixed Asset Management, Cost Reductions, and interaction with Outside Auditors. Notable achievements include SAP Power User, CI/Lean Basic Training-White Belt Certificate; Loss Prevention Team/Auditor/Fire Warden; Employee's Club Member. Protested property taxes and reduced property value by over $2M, saving the company more than $200K in annual property taxes and saving the company more than $21K in property tax consulting fees. Participated in Budget Committee for 2005 Budget. Spearheaded implementation of PB Views in the Accounting Department for all cost centers at SAI. Served as a SAP Power User in the Accounting Department. Served on the Core Process Review Team.

experience.title: Accountant
experience.description: Due diligence work on acquisitions. Balance sheet reconciliations for five divisions, and various other miscellaneous reconciliations in various systems.

experience.title: Cost/Inventory Accountant
experience.description: Performed month-end close; set up new and updated current SUCs, warehouse mapping, MAC mapping, CASS weekly import, Open Payables Account and Inventory reconciliations after month-end close. Process changes in January 2013 changing from SUC to AUC; analyzed costs weekly to verify reasonableness. Consolidation of Open Payables (Open PO Receipts) for Cost/Inventory Accounting Group. Occasionally assisted with fixed asset and inventory audits at locations around the United States. Additional activities: CI White Belt, Loss Prevention Team, Fire Warden, Auditor and Employee's Club Member.

experience.title: Accountant II - Environmental Solutions Spare Parts HUB
experience.description: Performed all accounting functions for the supply hub. Analyzed financial reports and records, ensured accuracy and reported anomalies. Reviewed and verified the accuracy of journal entries. Reconciled cycle/physical counts and management reports. Provided reports for auditors. Served as a resource for US Districts regarding cycle counts, in-transit reconciliation and inventory issues. Processed all payables for purchase orders. This was a new facility, so procedures for the accounting functions were set up. Additional activities: Loss Prevention Team.

experience.title: Fixed Asset Accountant
experience.description: Appropriation Request reconciliations using Oracle, CETA and SAM software to reconcile CIP accounts in the Corporate Accounting Fixed Asset Group. Tracked all capital spending against approved capital requests. Coordinated fixed asset additions.

experience.title: Accountant
experience.description: Ultraflote-State Income Tax Returns; audit schedules including inventory; cleanup of accounts receivable and accounts payable; state sales tax and payroll taxes.

experience.title: Senior Accountant
experience.description: Prepared financial reports, developed budgets, and performed variance analysis in accordance with business plans for senior management, including team/project leaders. Prepared monthly/annual financial schedules and budgets, including cost centers and projects, as well as inception-to-date figures. Oversaw general accounting functions, including inter-company invoicing to Parent and other affiliates, AP for Technology Center, account reconciliation, and fixed assets. Responsible for all commercial insurance policies for SAI.
